ygData.subject: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Naeeldar you ve twisted my original point.  I stated that Verant s main focus should be on fixing what is broke in the game and then adding new quests/items
ygData.messageBody:
Naeeldar you've twisted my original point. I stated that Verant's main
focus should be on fixing what is broke in the game and then adding new
quests/items for all levels 1-50. This benefits everyone and is a
legitimate problem. Just because you don't agree with me doesn't it isn't
legitimate. Your only concern is overcrowding for level 50 players. Fixing
this benefits only a select group.

This issue be easily settled if Verant would conduct a poll when you log in.
I'm surprised they haven't use that capability more often.

Galtin of E'ci (surprised this thread hasn't been kabonged yet)

> Either way the prohblem of the matter is you have people complaining over
> a
> legititment problem and then you have people complaining they never get
> something new. So I'll put this simple see the diffrence? See who deserves
> the change?
>
> Naeeldar
>
>
